name: ceqsexv2d
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mp2b(wex(s0, w0), w1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| w1
-| wi(w1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))

body.origin:

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Elimination of an existential quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2016.)
